backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for a finance education platform, including user profile management, password handling, quiz results, predictions, portfolio, news feed, market alerts, leaderboard, and community forum with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with their IDs, titles, associated files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels for the finance platform frontend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's purpose, covering pages, components, hooks, and routing for the FinIQ finance education platform.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, chart palettes, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'AI-Powered Finance Education & Investment Intelligence Platform' and mounting the app at `#root`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes, renders the top navigation, profile setup modal, footer, and a protected route wrapper requiring Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/BiometricAuthBut: React component providing WebAuthn-based biometric registration and authentication, storing credential IDs in localStorage and displaying status feedback with appropriate icons.
frontend/src/components/ChatInput.tsx: A chat input component with an auto-resizing textarea and send button that submits messages on click or Enter key, showing a loading spinner when awaiting a response.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Renders a single chat message bubble with an avatar, formatted timestamp, and distinct styling for user vs. bot messages.
A dialog modal for creating a community forum post with a text area (500-char limit) and optional stock symbol tags (up to 5).
frontend/src/components/ForumPostCard.ts: Displays a forum post card with author info, relative timestamp, content, stock symbol badges, and an upvote button with vote count.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: A reusable wrapper component that applies a glassmorphism card style with optional hover animation and glow effects.
frontend/src/components/HoldingForm.tsx: A dialog form for adding or editing a portfolio holding, allowing the user to select a stock symbol, enter share count, and set an average buy price.
frontend/src/components/LivePriceChart.t: Displays a real-time line chart of a stock's simulated price ticks (up to 60 points, updated every 3 seconds) with color coding relative to the session open price.
Shows a live-updating price ticker for a given stock symbol with flash animation on price changes, displaying current price, absolute change, and percent change with directional color coding.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, showing an avatar and display name when authenticated or a login button with loading state when not.
frontend/src/components/MarketAlertBanne: Displays a list of dismissible market alert banners with severity-based styling (critical/high/medium) and relative timestamps derived from ICP nanosecond timestamps.
Renders a collapsible news article card showing sentiment badge, market impact, score, date, and related stock symbols using data from the backend NewsArticle type.
frontend/src/components/PasswordSetupMod: A modal dialog for setting or updating a user password that SHA-256 hashes the input before saving, with strength indicator and validation feedback.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioAllocat: Renders a donut pie chart showing portfolio allocation by holding value, using mock stock prices and Recharts with a custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioPerform: Renders a bar chart displaying per-holding gain/loss percentage relative to average buy price, with green/red coloring based on sign.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioRiskHea: Renders a scatter chart plotting each holding's portfolio weight against simulated sector-based volatility, with bubble size proportional to position value.
frontend/src/components/PredictionCard.t: Renders a card displaying a single stock prediction with the user's prediction, AI prediction, and actual outcome, along with a correct/incorrect indicator and optional result text.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter a display name and saves their profile via a mutation hook before they can use the platform.
frontend/src/components/SentimentImpactC: A composed Recharts chart that visualizes sentiment scores and simulated market price over time from a list of news articles, using an area series for sentiment and a line for price.
A Recharts line chart that displays historical closing prices for a given stock symbol, with color-coded positive/negative trend and a reference line at the opening price.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: The sticky top navigation bar with links to all major app sections, a bell icon showing urgent market alert count, and login/profile controls for authenticated users.
frontend/src/data/learningTopics.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and a static array of learning topics (e.g., Stock Market Basics) each containing educational content markdown and associated quiz questions with answers.
frontend/src/data/mockStocks.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for OHLC stock data and mock stocks, and exports a list of mock stocks (AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, etc.) with randomly generated 30-day price histories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLivePrice.ts: Custom hook that simulates a live-updating stock price for a given symbol by polling getLivePrice on a configurable interval and tracking session open price, change percent, and direction.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, covering user profiles, passwords, learning progress, predictions, portfolios, conversations, posts, news, and alerts.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a dark finance-themed design system with OKLCH CSS custom properties for colors, glass-morphism utilities, and component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdvisorChatPage.tsx: A rule-based AI advisor chat page that generates contextual financial advice based on user messages, portfolio holdings, prediction accuracy, and news sentiment. Renders a chat interface with message history, input, and context cards using data from multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ApiReferencePage.tsx: An interactive API reference page that documents and lets users live-test four public backend endpoints (news feed, market alerts, stock list, leaderboard) by calling them via the actor hook and displaying formatted JSON responses.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityForumPage.ts: A community forum page where authenticated users can create posts and upvote existing ones, with sorting by latest or top-voted, built using forum query/mutation hooks and a modal for post creation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The marketing landing page featuring a hero section, a grid of six platform module links, and a features overview, with a login button for unauthenticated users using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/LearningModulePage.ts: A learning hub page that displays a grid of finance topic cards with overall progress tracking, showing completed vs. remaining lessons fetched from the backend via a query hook.
frontend/src/pages/NewsModulePage.tsx: Displays a financial news feed with AI sentiment analysis, showing articles filtered by search/sentiment and stats (positive/negative/neutral counts, avg score), plus a sentiment impact chart and market alert banner.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioAnalyzerPage: Portfolio management page that lets users add/edit/remove holdings, displays live-priced allocation and performance charts, a risk heatmap, and AI-generated diversification suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing learning progress, prediction accuracy, portfolio performance summary, and security options (password setup, biometric auth) tied to the user's Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/StockPlaygroundPage.t: Stock prediction arena where users select a stock, submit a directional prediction (Up/Down/Flat), and compare their result against an AI-generated forecast, with a history tab showing past predictions and accuracy.
frontend/src/pages/TopicLessonPage.tsx: Renders a single learning topic lesson by parsing markdown-like content into styled React elements, with navigation to previous/next topics and completion status from the user's learning progress.
frontend/src/pages/TopicQuizPage.tsx: React page component that renders a multiple-choice quiz for a given learning topic, tracks user answers, shows per-question feedback, and saves completion progress to the backend on quiz submission.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helper functions to read URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive parameters from the URL hash without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that sets up dark mode, custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), an extended OKLCH-based color palette, custom shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON file tracking the overall project state (version 15) for an AI-powered finance education platform, listing implemented features, architectural notes, and known issues across modules like learning, stock prediction, news intelligence, portfolio analysis, and an AI chatbot.
